casebody.data:
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH & HUMAN SERVICES, et al.
v.
PARKER HOME CARE, LLC, et al. No. 175P16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 11, 2016. Michael T. Wood, Special Deputy Attorney General, for N.C. Deparment of Health and Human Services, et al. Matthew W. Wolfe, Raleigh, for Parker Home Care, LLC. Brenda Eaddy, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Deparment of Health and Human Services, et al. Justin Richman, for Cardinal Innovations Healthcare Solutions, et al.

Richard P. Leissner, Jr., New Bern.

Richard P. Leissner, Jr., New Bern, for Cardinal Innovations Healthcare Solutions, et al. Andrew M. Walsh, for Cardinal Innovations Healthcare Solutions, et al. Evelyn M. Savage, Pinehurst, for Cardinal Innovations Healthcare Solutions, et al. Tracy J. Hayes, for Cardinal Innovations Healthcare Solutions, et al. Carol W. Hammett, for Cardinal Innovations Healthcare Solutions, et al. James D. Wall, Winston-Salem, for Cardinal Innovations Healthcare Solutions, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 10th of May 2016 by the State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th of May 2016."
